title: If Ashe was a pokemon...
body:
[](http://lol.esportspedia.com/w/images/thumb/b/ba/Ashe_0.jpg/200px-Ashe_0.jpg)
She would be a lapras
http://25.media.tumblr.com/38984237093e45c9e7e3252d8eefec91/tumblr_mx6kq12REo1t4u7wwo1_500.gif
Because lapras is the only ice type with any connection to arrows.

replies.body: cloest connection I could make, what would you prefer to have seen?

I think a Weavile might have been a closer fit... kind of

OK, I have no clue what I would have preferred

Well, y'see, Ashe is an archer
